mapper.select: select a.appeal_id appealId, a.appeal_type appealType, b.user_name appealUser, a.appeal_tel appealTel, a.appeal_local appealLocal, a.appeal_degree appealDegree, a.appeal_text appealText, a.appeal_path appealPath, a.create_time createTime, a.update_time updateTime, (case a.appeal_status when '01' then '未受理' when '02' then '待核实' when '03' then '待结案' when '04' then '已结案' else '' end) appealStatus, a.acceptor_user acceptorUser from zly_appeal a left join zly_user b on a.appeal_user = b.user_id where a.appeal_id = #{appealId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
